comment._content: Excellent!  Marvelous all, beautifully captured in this photograph.

comment.author: 82609930@N06
comment._content: This is Carol M. Highsmith.  It was a challenge to make such a beautiful iconic building look as good as it does in real life.  The Thomas Jefferson Building is one of the most beautiful interiors in America and it rivals historic European museums.  I am honored to have my images represent such a grand place.  I spent two years working on the project and I'm sure there are still nuances that need to be captured.

comment.author: 63106957@N07
comment._content: Thank you very much your excellency.
